com.topcoder.catalog.entity.unittests.persistence
Class ComponentEntityTest

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          com.topcoder.catalog.entity.unittests.persistence.CommonEntityTest<Component>
              com.topcoder.catalog.entity.unittests.persistence.BaseComponentEntityTest
                  com.topcoder.catalog.entity.unittests.persistence.ComponentEntityTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class ComponentEntityTest
extends BaseComponentEntityTest

This test checks all attributes of Component entity correspond database's columns.

Before each test the setUp() method is called. This method saves all necessary foreign entities to database and the entity itself.

If the entity saved successfully, it indicates that all constraints are satisfied.

After that each method tries to find the entity by a field value pointed in where clause.

If the list is empty, then the test fails. It guarantees that each entity attribute mapped to a separate database column (no values in all entities tests are duplicated).

Version:
1.0
Author:
TCSDEVELOPER
